title: Find Digital Root of a number
contentHtml:
Write a program to find digital root of a number

Digital root of a number is the recursive sum of its digits until we get a single digit number.

Input  : 1234
Output : 1

markdown:
## Write a program to find digital root of a number

Digital root of a number is the recursive sum of its digits until we get a single digit number.

```
Input  : 1234
Output : 1
```
